title: Supercharged 350-Powered 1947 Ford Super Deluxe Convertible Street Rod
description: This 1947 Ford Super Deluxe Convertible street rod was acquired by the seller's father in 2019, and a 350ci General Motors V8, supercharger, and four-speed automatic transmission were subsequently installed. A Hilborn-style air scoop is mounted over the dual Edelbrock carburetors, and the car also has an aluminum radiator, a custom dual exhaust system, 15" alloy wheels, four-wheel disc brakes, a Lokar shifter, a tilt column, air conditioning, and coil-sprung front end with power steering. This Ford street rod is now offered by the seller on behalf of the owner's estate with a top boot and a New Jersey title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a Supercharged 350-Powered 1947 Ford Super Deluxe Convertible Street Rod at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #167,151.
